channel.title: Fang on Long Short
channel.description: Recent content in Fang on Long Short

item.title: FANG Stocks
item.description: FAANG stock performance since July 1, 2018 With Netflix and Facebook both suffering major losses, all eyes will be on Apple as it races to be the first company with a $1 Trillion valuation. How have the FAANG stocks performed YTD Netflix and Amazon have clearly dominated the large cap stocks. This has been a terrible year of performance for managers who make a living by shorting “bubble basket stocks”.
